channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel -- McAfee Email Gateway (MEG)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel -- McAfee Email Gateway (MEG)

item.title: CVE-2016-8005|2024-08-06T02:13:21.613Z -- intel -- mcafee%20email%20gateway%20%28meg%29
item.description: File extension filtering vulnerability in Intel Security McAfee Email Gateway (MEG) before 7.6.404h1128596 allows attackers to fail to identify the file name properly via scanning an email with a forged attached filename that uses a null byte within the filename extension.
